description:
It’s time for the quiz festival you’ve all been waiting for! The Akudarma Trio head to New York in 1886 along with Fukuzawa-san. They get thrown into a sudden quiz about the symbol of America, the Statue of Liberty. The winner will get the Dynamond that the Statue of Liberty has. And then Tokio and Calen show up. They all participate in a huge quiz tournament in order to get the Dynamond!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Announcer Fukuzawa Appears Once Again! The Statue of Liberty Ultra Quiz!
Fukuzawa-ana Mata Kenzan! Jiyuu no Megami Ultra Quiz!
福澤アナまた見参! 自由の女神ウルトラクイズ!
